rukus.text: 39|53|Jibun no tamashi ni somuite ayamachi o okashita waga shimo be-tachi ni ie,`soredemo arra no jihi ni taishite zetsubo shite wa naranai' arra wa, hontoni subete no tsumi o yurusa reru. Kare wa kan'yo ni shite jihibukaku ara reru.
39|54|Anata gata wa chobatsu ga kuru mae ni, omo ni kaigo shite kaeri, kare ni fukuju, kie shi nasai. Sono (chobatsu ga yattekita)-gode wa, anata gata wa tasukaranai.
39|55|Anata gataga kidzukanai-chu, totsuzen chobatsu ga yattekuru mae ni,-nushi kara anata gata ni kudasa reta mottomo yoi (michi) ni shitagae.
39|56|Tamashi ga ko no yo ni iwanai yo. “A nasakenai, watashi wa arrahe (jibun no gimu o) okotatte ita. Hontoni watashi wa chosho-sha no hitorideatta. ”
39|57|Matawa,“arra ga watashi o, onmichibiki kudasa retanaraba, watashi wa kanarazu omo o osoreta mono o. ” To iwanai yo.
39|58|Mata chobatsu o mita toki,“watashi ka moichido (gense ni) kaererunaraba, watashi wa kanarazu yoi okonai o suru mono no hitori ni narudearou. ” To iwanai yo.
39|59|Iya sode wanai. Tashikani waga shirushi wa kudatta nodearo. Daga anata gata wa sore o usodearu to shita. Soshite koman de fushinjin'na hitori to natta.'
39|60|Shinpan no hi, anata wa arra ni taishi kyogi o katatta-sha-tachi o miyou. Kare-ra no kao wa kuroku kawarudearou. Jigoku ni wa, koman'na mono no sumai ga nai to iu no ka.
39|61|Daga arra wa,-nushi o osoreta mono o antaina basho ni sukuu. Kare-ra wa saiyaku ni au koto mo naku, urei mo nai.
39|62|Arra wa, subete no mono no sozo-shadeari, mata subete no mono no kanrishadearu.
39|63|Ten to ji no kagi wa arra no yudearu. Kare no shirushi o kyohi shita mono koso shippai-shadearu.
